LanguageData.PsychiteTea.label: coca pekoe
LanguageData.PsychiteTea.description: A fragrant tea infused with leaves of the coca plant. Drinking it induces a subtle cocaine euphoria. This tea is easy to produce at cooking facilities, but can produce addiction if consumed too often.\n\nMany tribes use coca pekoe, both as a daily energizer, and as part of social and religious rituals.
